description: Driving Sports TV is the online video network featuring exclusive shows, news and automotive adventures!
title: Driving Sports TV: Official HD

episodes.title: Are Car Infotainment Systems Dangerous? (Audio Only)
episodes.description: Host Ryan Douthit has used almost every navigation system available. Which is better? Join the conversation with Joel Feder from MotorAuthority and Sarah Shelton from U.S. News & World Report as guests. In this video we specifically look at the 2018 Volvo S90, Lexus LC500, Honda Odyssey Elite and Audi TT.

episodes.title: Insider Secrets: How to Film Cars (Audio Only)
episodes.description: Warwick Patterson, Producer of Subaru's award-winning Launch Control series, and Matt Johnston, producer of the film "Easier Said than Done" and cameraman on several Ken Block Gymkhana videos join host Ryan Douthit for a discussion and live Q&A about filming cars.

episodes.title: GRC Seattle VLOG
episodes.description: Walking around the pits and watching the races at Global Rallycross Championship Seattle's Day 1 competition.

episodes.title: Launch Control 406: Military Grade
episodes.description: Subaru Rally Team USA returns to Red Bull Global Rallycross for the first time this season at MCAS New River, North Carolina. Over an extended off-season, the team has done its homework. They’ve chased speed with patience.  They’ve tested with analytical determination. Now it’s time to take the next step in the development journey, door-to-door against the competition. As thunderstorms loom overhead, Bucky Lasek and Sverre Isachsen head into battle.

episodes.title: Launch Control 405: Made in America
episodes.description: It's Subaru around the globe as David Higgins tackles a rally in China with a new XV Crosstrek Rally Car, while his brother, Mark Higgins, attempts another world record at the Isle of Man TT. Plus, David Higgins and Travis Pastrana face off at the Susquehannock Trail Performance Rally (STPR) in Pennsylvania.

episodes.title: Red Rock Concourse Contest
episodes.description: Are you in Las Vegas? Check out the Red Rock Concourse D'Elegance on September 25!

episodes.title: Breaking News: The Grand Tour Launch Date Revealed! (Exclusive)
episodes.description: And the launch date that the new Amazon.com series starring Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May is...

episodes.title: Launch Control 404: Grip Management
episodes.description: Higgins and Drew return to the Olympus Rally in Washington State. Meanwhile, across the globe, Subaru Technica International face their greatest challenge during the Nurburgring 24 Hours: a sudden and potentially catastrophic change in the weather.

episodes.title: Trading Tenths - Launch Control 403
episodes.description: Pastrana and Higgins face off once again, this time at the grueling Oregon Trail Rally. When the dust finally clears, which member of the Subaru Rally Team USA will come out on top?

episodes.title: Launch Control 402 - The Rivals Within Pt. 2
episodes.description: Travis Pastrana and co-driver Christian Edstrom hold slim lead going into Day 2 at Rally in the 100 Acre Wood. Can they keep ahead of teammates David Higgins and Craig Drew? There are 70 more stage miles to go and it's anyones guess how this will shake out. Meanwhile, in Vermont, the Red Bull Global Rallycross Subarus are undergoing shakedown to prepare for the new season.

episodes.title: The Rivals Within - Launch Control Eps 401
episodes.description: At the Rally in the 100 Acre Wood, Travis Pastrana faces teammate David Higgins in equal machinery for the first time. It's just another day at the office. This is Launch Control, Season 4.

episodes.title: One lap in the Ford Mustang GT350R
episodes.description: Ryan Douthit takes you for a ride in the Ford Mustang GT350R at Mazda Raceway Laguna Seca.

episodes.title: 2017 Hyundai Elantra Limited Quick Drive
episodes.description: The new Hyundai Elantra is big on features, small on size. In this quick view we level our quick opinion about Hyundai's latest. It's all you need to know in just over a minute.

episodes.title: 2016 Lexus RX 350 F Sport Quick Look
episodes.description: The new Lexus RX is more aggressive. But is it a face only a mother could love?

episodes.title: 2016 Ford Fiesta Turbo Quick Drive
episodes.description: All you need to know about the 2016 Ford Fiesta Turbo in about one minute.

episodes.title: 2016 Chevy Camaro V6 Reviewed and Driven
episodes.description: Ryan drives the all-new 2016 Chevrolet Camaro 2LT RS and compares it against the new Ford Mustang.

episodes.title: Journalists in a Subaru BRZ (Isle of Man)
episodes.description:
Ryan heads back to the Isle of Man to experience what it's like to drive the BRZ that bested him two years prior. Special appearances by Jeff Glucker (Hooniverse), John Lamb (Automobile Magazine), Marty Padgett (High Gear Media) and photographer Ian Merrit. 

After that, pro driver Mark Higgins gets to instruct the crew in how to drive a proper Group-N Rally Car. He's got his work cut out for him, that's for sure. 

Watch more from the Isle of Man on the official Driving Sports TV Roku Channel or at www.drivingsports.com

episodes.title: Ken Block at Oregon Trail Rally 2013 #throwbackthursday
episodes.description: A Throwback Thursday special: Highlights from the Driving Sports TV coverage of the 2013 Oregon Trail Rally featuring Hoonigan Racing's Ken Block.

episodes.title: Launch Control 3.14: Chasing the Legacy
episodes.description: In the Season 3 Finale of Launch Control: David Higgins and Craig Drew represent Subaru at Wales Rally GB, to celebrate the 20th anniversary of the car maker's first WRC Championship title.

episodes.title: Holiday Special Feat. 2016 Toyota Tacoma
episodes.description: Aaron heads to the mountains to find the perfect Christmas Tree. In the process, he takes a closer look at the new 2016 Toyota Tacoma TRD Off-Road Edition.
